name: Pyro Regisvine
desc:
A giant vine that has absorbed the ancient flame that rages within the ley lines.
It is restless as if filled with endless fury.
Poets, bards, and even some academics believe that elements also contain emotions and hopes. If this is true, then one can only wonder what emotions cause the Pyro Regisvine to burn eternally, writhing like one longing to be free of the confines of the earth...

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Fragment
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name..."

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Chunk
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name...
Burnt to cinders for a dream."

dropMaterial.name: Agnidus Agate Gemstone
dropMaterial.desc:
Character Ascension material.
"A pilgrimage for a wish; a battle to earn a name...
Burnt to cinders for a dream.
If the intention yet remains, achieved ██'s truth he has."

dropMaterial.name: Everflame Seed
dropMaterial.desc:
A seed that fuels the unending flames of the Pyro Regisvine. It emits Pyro energy as if it will burn all that has ever sprouted from the ground.
Endless desires flow among turbulent energy deep within the earth. What desire could steadily hold such fire to the plants and long so eagerly to bathe everything in unquenchable flames?

customize.text: Massive elemental plants that grow deep underground. They use their brightly colored flowers to lure in their prey, attacking anyone that treads too closely. Perhaps the fruit that appears like a <color=#ffe14b>Pyro core</color> growing near their roots could be an effective means of dealing damage...

<color=#ffd780>"That Was Blooming Hot"</color>
Defeat a Pyro Regisvine without destroying its corolla weak point.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Core Meltdown</color>
Destroy the Blazing Seed created by a Pyro Regisvine.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>September 22, 2020</color>
Hello Travelers,
Come on, let's follow Outrider Amber to scout out this fierce and fiery plant — Pyro Regisvine!
<color=#ffacff>HoYoLAB:</color> <color=#37ffff>https:/www.hoyolab.com/article/17114</color>
